survey_name: Digital Nomad Remote Work Tools Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate the satisfaction and effectiveness of digital tools used by remote workers and digital nomads to enhance productivity and work-life balance.

questions.question_text: Which of the following digital tools do you use most frequently for remote work? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Cloud Storage Services (e.g., Google Drive, Dropbox)
Virtual Meeting Platforms (e.g., Zoom, Google Meet)
questions.client_notes: Consider including an 'Other' option to capture tools not listed. Ensure mobile-friendly checkbox design.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes). Include an 'Other' open-text field if selected.
